text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hmm, bust, waist, and hip… with no additions! And no color preference written down in the remarks!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yup, if we keep this pace up we should be able to finish everything by this evening! Thank goodness! But it's actually quite difficult to be a costume checker, huh?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: The only person left is Yukippe, right? She said she'd be waiting for us around here, but I don't see her anywhere…

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Umm… I'm right here… The outfit fits well…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Oh it's you, Yukino-san! You look absolutely amazing! I thought an idol was coming to talk to us for a moment there!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: No no, I don't look like an idol! But anyways, I'm really sorry for calling you two out all the way here. This outfit is kind of embarrassing and I didn't want too many people to see it…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huh, why not!? Yukippe, you look adorable!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: No, no, no, no! This outfit's way too revealing! You can see my legs and stomach!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I keep checking behind me to make sure no one's looking. Th-Then there's the upcoming live performance…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Is there something bothering you about the live performance?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: W-Well… I heard that a lot of people from my hometown bought tickets to the performance!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Geez, I'm just so nervous! And to add onto that, this outfit…
(BOM BOM BOM BOM…!)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oryaaaa! I'm not going to lose this, I've got the entirety of Oi pushing me forward!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: There's so many people that helped me along the way too! Tome-san, Shige-san, Chiyo-san, and Yoshi-san, I can still see their smiles!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, you and I are really similar, huh!? That means there ain't no way I'ma lose now! Feel the spirit of Oi!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Then I'll show you the spirit of Kasamatsu!

text_block_list.name: Inari & Oguri
text_block_list.text: Huwaaaaaahh!! Waaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Woah! The beach sand turned into a cloud of dust!! Ah, I can't even see them anymore!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: The spirit of Oi and the spirit of Kasamatsu. I see, so those two came from the countryside too, huh?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Uwaah! There's so many people and so many stalls! Tamaya!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, I'm so excited! I see takoyaki, cotton candy, and chocolate bananas! Where should we start?♪

text_block_list.name: Festival Organising Committee
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, I'm glad to see you girls are enjoying yourselves! Oh, my bad. I'm part of the preparation committee for this festival. Are you girls on a summer training camp?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Yup, you're right! But we're taking a break for today. It's really lively here today, huh!?

text_block_list.name: Festival Organising Committee
text_block_list.text: Yeah, we've been preparing for this festival for the past year. But it wasn't just the preparation committee, the entire community came out in droves to help.

text_block_list.name: Festival Organising Committee
text_block_list.text: It's amazing to see this normally quiet place come to life again. I hope you guys will enjoy yourself before you head back home!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Of course we will! Hehe… this is so strange. Even though I've never been here, everything feels so nostalgic.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ah, I feel like Kochi's festivals also had a similar feeling to them! Everyone would dance in beautiful clothing and everything felt so warm.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hokkaido was the same way! We usually have a bon odori festival around this time of year. The excitement and warmth during that festival was just like this one!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: You can really feel the love and care put into those festivals. They also help to reignite the fire in the community…

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: That's right… Giving back to the community…

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I… wish I could give back to my hometown… I hope that my performances and races will help to get them excited!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Just like the people hosting this festival and Inari-san and Oguri-san, they're all carrying their hometowns on their backs!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Alright, I've made up my mind! I'm going to stop being afraid! In the upcoming performance I'm going to dance my heart out!

text_block_list.name: Spe & Urara
text_block_list.text: Woah!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: And I'm going to enter a race near my hometown! I'm going to make it super exciting, win, and show them an amazing performance afterwards!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That sounds like a great idea! I should go back home and do the same!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Woah, really!? Well I won't be left out on this!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I'm getting so excited! I'll be in Morioka, Spe-san will be in Hokkaido, and Urara-san will be in Kochi!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: We're all carrying the hopes and dreams of our hometowns on our shoulders! We'll show them an amazing race, an amazing victory, and an amazing performance afterwards!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: We'll repay them for all they've done for us!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: I really like your spirit!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Inari-san and Oguri-san!?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: But if yer really gonna do it, you better not give up the spotlight to anyone. If you're not prepared to do that, it ain't gonna be fun!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Don't give up the spotlight to anyone…!? I don't think I'll be able to… No, no, that's the wrong mind set!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I-I won't let anyone steal my spotlight! I'm the star of Morioka after all!
(fshuuu… BANG!)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Perfect timing, huh? Gotta love it. But Oguri, we can't let them one up us!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: If the next generation's gonna be so determined, we're gonna have to grow stronger too!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Heh, you're right… We'll need to show them that we're not finished yet!
